rules_text:
[i]Consume [/i]– {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astral-Touched Tadpole: Target creature with a tadpole counter on it becomes a black Horror in addition to its other colors and types. Put a flying counter on it.
[i]Commune [/i]– {2}, {T}: Target creature with a tadpole counter on it becomes a black Horror in addition to its other colors and types. Put a flying counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.
